com.centurylink.mdw.model

Class JsonableThrowable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.centurylink.mdw.model.JsonableThrowable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.limberest.json.Jsonable

    public class JsonableThrowable
extends java.lang.Object
implements Jsonable
    Represents a Throwable as a Jsonable for JSON serialization.
